Text: The Imperial House of Japan (皇室 , kōshitsu ) , also referred to as the Imperial Family, and the Yamato dynasty, comprises those members of the extended family of the reigning Emperor of Japan who undertake official and public duties.
Triplets:<The Imperial House of Japan
3:
--------------------
Text: Imperial House of Japan:  The duties as an Emperor are passed down the line to their children and so on.
